_description: Laȝamon’s Brut — in rhyming alliterative lines

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines: A preost was on leoden laȝamon was ihotenHe wes leouenaðes sone liðe him beo drihten…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines: …Þa ȝet ne com þas ilke dai beo heonne uorð alse hi maiI wurðe þet iwurðe I wurðe Godes willeAmen

BLCottOthCXIII.First Lines: …Eschamus þe kene þat was in kinges studefour and þritti winter he held þat londand þat folke mid blisse þe þoru his liues hende…
BLCottOthCXIII.Note: 23590 lines; written as prose; begins imperfectly: fire damage, so first complete line is line 21 on 1ra, transcribed as first above; last several leaves illegible.
